name: Egg Sandwich Adventures: DX. The Chronicles of the Caviar. Chapter II
name_original: Egg Sandwich Adventures: DX. The Chronicles of the Caviar. Chapter II
description:
Play as a lonely egg sandwich, lost and scared among a vast cave system. Your only chance of survival is finding provision to better your bready form, but something is lurking in the deep...
